summary: Updates the git repository by pulling changes from origin, adding all files, committing with "update" message, and pushing to origin.

details.comment: Updates the git repository by pulling changes from origin, adding all files, committing with "update" message, and pushing to origin.
details.content:
@REM git config --global --add safe.directory E:/works/git_atomic_commit
git pull origin main
git add .
git commit -m "update"
git push origin main
